title: Bladed Glove
summaries: The Bladed Glove is a rare fast-hitting melee weapon with a very short range that has a 1/2000 (0.05%) chance of being dropped by any weak enemy during the Halloween seasonal event. It can be a very effective weapon when fighting pre-Hardmode melee enemies due to the high speed, and therefore, damage output. The Fetid Baghnakhs(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) can be considered its Hardmode upgrade.

statistics.Damage: 14 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 12 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Melee)
statistics.Sell: 1 GC
